about: Fourth-year IT student specializing in JavaScript development with hands-on experience in fullstack web technologies. Passionate about creating scalable web applications and eager to contribute as a team player in a dynamic development environment. Dedicated to continuous learning and professional growth with a clear goal of advancing to a Junior Developer role within the next two years.

education.location: Da Nang University of Science and Technology
education.name: Engineering Degree in Information Technology

services.name: API Development
services.description: Develop and maintain robust APIs for web and mobile platforms, ensuring seamless integration through clear and comprehensive API documentation.

services.name: Web UI Development
services.description: Build responsive and user-friendly web interfaces based on design specifications, with seamless API integration.

services.name: Web Development
services.description: Deliver end-to-end web solutions by developing both frontend and backend components, including APIs and user interfaces.

services.name: IoT Server Development
services.description: Develop and maintain the server-side infrastructure for IoT solutions, focusing on device communication, data processing, and integration with cloud platforms for real-time monitoring and control.

projects.name: Social media app
projects.description: This project is inspired by Locket, a popular mobile social media app. I found the idea interesting and wanted to see if I could create my own backend platform and a web version of the app. It includes most of Locket's features and adds new APIs for admins to manage the system, users, reports, and other tasks.

projects.name: Family Guy player
projects.description: One day, my favorite cartoon website went down, and I couldnâ€™t find any site streaming the Family Guy series. After a brief moment of frustration, I thought to myself, 'Why not build my own website?' And so, this website came to life after just four hours of development.

projects.name: Music player
projects.description: Music player is a practice project I built while learning JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This simple yet functional project helped me and others to practice and gain a deeper understanding of how JavaScript works in creating interactive web applications.

projects.name: Basic caculator
projects.description: Music player is just a super super basic project with HTML, CSS for UI and Javascript for implementing basic arithmetic operations. This was one of my first projects while learning JavaScript, showcasing fundamental web development skills.

projects.name: Snake hunting game
projects.description: This is a funny game i built when learning Typescript. It is insprired by a old game in Nokia 3310 called Snake hunting game. I added one more funny and super hard level - Asian level, you want to turn left, snake will turn right, you want to go up, snake will go down :)). Basically, this level will reverse your choosen directions. Have fun with it!
